meanings.definition: The process of producing a picture on a silver-coated copper plate.
meanings.sent1: Daguerreotypy involves creating images on metal plates.
meanings.sent2: She admired the beautiful daguerreotypy of her ancestors.
meanings.sent3: The artist tried to use daguerreotypy to capture the mischievous sparkle in the cat's eyes.
meanings.sent4: His memory was like a daguerreotypy, capturing moments in perfect detail.
meanings.sent5: The daguerreotypy of the old town square brought history to life.

meanings.sent2: He treasured the daguerreotypy of his great-grandparents on their wedding day.
